name: Baldis Basics Education School
description:
You are a student in a school where a math teacher is a strict and terrible bald man with a ruler in his hands.
Your task is to solve complex and not very examples in notebooks that are found throughout the school.
The more mistakes there are, the faster Baldi will move through schools.
Beware of other residents of the school who will disturb you, and sometimes help in the process of the game.

An exciting adventure, which this year will be exactly 1 year old!
Try on yourself all the charms of this game, which everyone likes so much!

If you find our horror game funny in baldi's basic, please send us your feedback. We'll collect each your idea and best of these scenarios you'll see in future updates.

Good luck and enjoy the basics of Baldi in education and training!
